abstract: The latest version of Mac OS X is the first version sold as a download from Apple's Mac App Store. For those wondering how to revive an ailing Mac without a bootable disc, help is just a keyboard command away.
snippet: The latest version of Mac OS X is the first version sold as a download from Apple's Mac App Store. For those wondering how to revive an ailing Mac without a bootable disc, help is just a keyboard command away.
lead_paragraph: The latest version of Mac OS X (10.7, also known as "Lion") is the first version of the operating system sold as a download from Apple's Mac App Store. For those wondering how to revive an ailing Mac (that cannot start up on its own) without a bootable disc and Apple's Disk Utility program, help is just a keyboard command away.

headline.main: Tip of the Week: Reviving a Wounded Lion
